level.heading: Smoking prohibitions pursuant to existing law.
level.text: Nothing in this subchapter shall make lawful smoking in any place in which smoking is prohibited pursuant to § 6-1401 et seq., § 35-251(b), or any other District of Columbia or federal law.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 7-100
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 7-100, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 7-1703.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority under D.C. Law 3-22, the District of Columbia Smoking Restriction Act of 1979, see Mayor's Order 90-192, December 13, 1990.
